replies.author: Silver_Leaf
replies.txt_content: 说吧，哪个地方，说话不清楚0.0

replies.author: q549365815
replies.txt_content: plugins\Multiverse-Core    修改里面的world.yml   在每个世界下的name右边改中文即可   格式用ANSI

replies.author: Z1195138716
replies.txt_content:
q549365815 发表于 2014-9-23 20:17
plugins\Multiverse-Core    修改里面的world.yml   在每个世界下的name右边改中文即可   格式用ANSI ...
能详细一点么

replies.author: luyucun
replies.txt_content: 用指令来修改默认名字，具体到百度查

replies.author: q549365815
replies.txt_content:
用notepad++打开
然后把格式转换成ANSI
然后就可以在name写中文就可以啦

replies.author: Pow.Papa
replies.txt_content: 多世界插件世界名字换一个就好了
